projects.title: Game Bot (Personal Project)
descriptions: Developed and maintained a bot that plays an online game via sockets.
Currently integrating reinforcement learning for better battle performance.

projects.title: Gomoku
descriptions: Developed a complete Gomoku game with both backend (Python) and frontend (TypeScript/React).
Implemented an AI opponent using the Minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning and heuristics.
Optimized performance by introducing memoization to avoid redundant calculations.

projects.title: Understanding Customer
descriptions: Designed deep learning experiments for intent classification using RNN, LSTM, and Transformer-based models.
Fine-tuned the Falconsai/intent_classification model on custom datasets to improve accuracy.
Compared preprocessing pipelines and architectures to evaluate model performance.

projects.title: MySpotify
descriptions: Built a recommendation engine that integrates multiple strategies: baseline, content-based, and collaborative filtering.
Implemented Word2Vec embeddings and MLP classifiers to model music similarity and user preferences.
Developed ALS-based collaborative filtering for personalized recommendations.

projects.title: Multilayer Perceptron
descriptions: Implemented a feed-forward multilayer perceptron from scratch to classify breast cancer data.
Built training, evaluation, and visualization modules including accuracy and loss curves.
Designed a modular prediction pipeline to validate real test cases.

projects.title: Leaffliction
descriptions: Developed a plant disease detection model using transfer learning with ResNet-18.
Applied data augmentation (resizing, grayscale, blur) to improve model robustness.
Separated training and prediction into modular scripts for easy reuse.

projects.title: Tweets
descriptions: Explored NLP techniques including bag-of-words, TF-IDF, stemming, lemmatization, and stopword removal.
Implemented similarity models with cosine distance and n-gram analysis.
Integrated word2vec embeddings to improve semantic understanding.

projects.title: Uber
descriptions: Performed time series analysis on Uber ride data to forecast demand.
Implemented Triple Exponential Smoothing (TES) and ARIMA models.
Engineered features such as ride counts by hour, day, and month.

projects.title: City Life
descriptions: Conducted geospatial analysis on urban mobility datasets.
Applied clustering techniques to identify patterns in city ride distribution.
Built interactive maps to visualize results with GeoPandas.

projects.title: Churn
descriptions: Implemented a fully-connected neural network to predict customer churn.
Explored hidden layers, activation functions, backpropagation, and dropout.
Evaluated model performance on real-world datasets.

projects.title: Fried Eggs
descriptions: Introduced deep learning for computer vision tasks such as object detection and segmentation.
Built pipelines for data labeling and model training.
Implemented convolutional neural networks for image recognition.

projects.title: Total-perspective-vortex
descriptions: Explored high-dimensional data processing techniques with Python.
Experimented with brainwave-driven human-computer interaction.
Built prototypes for interactive man-machine interfaces.

projects.title: Minishell
descriptions: Recreated a simplified Bash-like shell from scratch in C.
Implemented core functionalities: built-in commands (echo, cd, pwd, export, unset, env, exit), environment variable expansion, and exit status tracking via `$?`.

projects.title: Ft_services
descriptions: Containerized and deployed multiple services (Nginx, MySQL, WordPress, Grafana, InfluxDB, phpMyAdmin).
Used Docker Compose and Kubernetes to orchestrate a multi-service infrastructure.
Automated service deployment with custom shell scripts.

projects.title: Webserv
descriptions: Developed a fully functional HTTP server in C++ supporting HTTP/1.1.
Handled socket programming, request parsing, and response generation.
Supported CGI execution and tested compatibility with real browsers.

projects.title: Ft_transcendence
descriptions: Developed a full-stack web application with authentication, chat, and multiplayer Pong game.
Backend built with NestJS and PostgreSQL, frontend with React.
Integrated WebSockets for real-time interactions and containerized with Docker.
